TopicTitle: My game dont want to start

Articles.Content:
When i start run game its loading normaly but on loading ksp libraries game stoped(Does not freeze, image changes). If wait for a 40 minute +- game load, but if i just click or press any key  game not responding and freeze.
My PC specs:

GTX 750 Ti 2gb

Pentium G4400

8 GB DDR4

game on HDD
(I dont think problem in hardware, but who knows)

If you are using mods then uninstall them all and try to start the game again. If that does not work(or if you have no mods installed) verify the integrity of your game files via steam. If that doesn't work then delete your entire game files manually(put your save games in a safe spot) then completely reinstall ksp. 90% sure though that it is a mod causing this, had a similar situation happen to me when I had the 'missing history' mod installed because of incompatibility. 

Edited February 6, 2020 by RYU AZUKU99
